/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings and road. The image is slightly distorted due to the panoramic view, adding a sense of movement and dynamism to the scene.
